predefined_profiles.name: Link
predefined_profiles.public profile: Link is a cheerful and righteous young man who grew up in Crescent Village, but an accident led him to discover the secret of his origins...
predefined_profiles.goal: Successfully uncover the secrets of his origins and avenge Crescent Village.
predefined_profiles.private profile: Raised by Tian Lao Liu, but his biological parents were a couple known as the 'Evil Sword Mates' who didn't care about societal views.

predefined_profiles.name: Tian Lao Liu
predefined_profiles.public profile: Link's 'old man,' appears careless and even a bit crude, but is actually very kind-hearted.
predefined_profiles.goal: Raise Link well and tell him about his origins when necessary.
predefined_profiles.private profile: Link's adoptive father, who only reveals the mystery of Link's origins on his deathbed.

profile.name: Yan Feipeng
profile.public profile: A figure admired by Link as a youth, a typical 'righteous person', in opposition to the White Robe Sect led by Jiangnandao.
profile.goal: Guide Link onto the righteous path, uphold justice in the martial arts world

profile.name: Bandit
profile.public profile: A robber who appears where law and order are lacking; fierce but lacking intelligence
profile.private profile: Although he seems devoid of morals, there's a hint of a backstory

profile.name: Jiangnandao
profile.public profile: Leader of the White Robe Sect, interested in Link, wants to attract Link to join the White Robe Sect.
profile.private profile: Once indebted to Link's parents, parted ways with the so-called 'Righteous Path', founded the White Robe Sect to unveil the hypocrisy of the 'Righteous Path'

profile.name: Dibo
profile.public profile: Male disciple of the Wuyue Sword Sect, selfish and self-centered, a typical symbol of hypocrisy in the martial world’s 'Righteous Path'

profile.name: Lin Xi
profile.public profile: Link's father, along with Guo Lan known as the 'Evil Sword Couple', discontent with the hypocrisy of the 'Righteous Path', they part ways to roam freely in the martial world

profile.name: Guo Lan
profile.public profile: Link's mother, along with Lin Xi known as the 'Evil Sword Couple', together helped Jiangnandao in distress, eventually pursued by the 'Righteous Path' and committed suicide by jumping off a cliff

dialog.content: (Sleeping soundly, suddenly someone hits him) Ow, ow, ow! What? An ambush?
You lazy kid, leaving all that work undone while you take a nap?
Sharpening the axe doesn't delay the work of chopping firewood—
I'll have to tell Hero Yan about what you just said.
What?! Has Hero Yan arrived?
Look at how excited you are. Do you admire Hero Yan more than your old man?
Hehe... Every time Hero Yan and Big Brother Yuwen come to the village, they teach me a few moves and share fascinating tales of the martial world, way better than Dad.
You little brat, what do you mean 'way better'? Yan Feipeng, that guy...

What? Looking for me? Hahaha! Haven't been here in a year, and the village hasn't changed a bit! But that's just fine! This place is relaxing, no need to bother with those bothersome etiquette. I remember visiting the Quanzhen sect back then, those Taoists kept babbling stuff I couldn't understand, sitting there like a flock of cawing crows, truly annoying. Oh right, kid, since you've grown up, I should fulfill my promise and take you out to see the world. However, I've got some matters to attend to in Kaifeng, so you'll have to wait for me a few days.
Speaking of Kaifeng, I’ve left some things at the inn over there with the innkeeper. You should go over and handle that for me.

content.content: Alright, I'll go take care of it right away, without delay, Dad, just stay home and wait!
No problem, Dad, your health really isn't great, to prevent leaving things behind, I'll go on your behalf.
Okay, my memory and stamina are both better than yours, Dad, you should just stay home.
No problem, Dad, your memory's not great, if you forget what you're doing once you're out, it'll be troublesome. I'll handle this!

question: #question#How can Link express that he can fulfill his promise to his dad?

content.content: The journey to Kaifeng is long, and I'm still young; I'll likely need some travel funds to manage any issues...
Dad, you want me to run this errand, but you have to provide some travel money, or I won't go.
No way, I don't want to go; it's too far and exhausting alone... unless I get more travel funds to improve my travel comfort.
I can do it, but the travel fee needs to be more generous since I'm saving you quite a bit of trouble.

question: #question#How can Link persuade Tian Lao Liu to give him more travel funds?

dialog.content: (muttering) Why is he so unusual today, listening without objection? Usually, he pesters me endlessly for spare change. (thinking) This kid, for all his easygoing ways, he's really grown up...
(walking along, sees something) Ah, what's this up ahead...
Ladies, where are you rushing off to in such a hurry? Why not stay and play with me for a while?

profile.name: Jiang Linglu
profile.public profile: Though the daughter of the Jiangnan Dao leader of the White Clothing Sect, she is kind-hearted. Sometimes she is tied down by familial bonds, but in critical moments, she can sever ties with Jiangnan Dao.
profile.goal: Through her experiences wandering the martial world, she aims to discern right from wrong and ultimately help the righteous as she sees it.

profile.name: Shen Bing
profile.public profile: A disciple of the White Clothing Sect, arranged by Jiangnan Dao to be a female swordsman by Jiang Linglu's side. She is cold, but her martial skills are formidable.
profile.private profile: Responsible for the massacre at Crescent Moon Village.
profile.goal: To protect Jiang Linglu and serve the White Clothing Sect.

dialog.content: What should we do now?
With you around, when do we not encounter trouble?
(lost for words) ... (looks outside) Ah, that person over there! Sis, look, isn't there a kind soul coming to rescue us!
Ahem, let go of those ladies and watch me—
They're just a bunch of thugs, no need for anyone else to step in. (Starts to fight, and in no time, the bandits are groaning on the ground)
Thank you, young hero, for your assistance.
No, I didn't do much, really, most of them were taken down by your sister. (stumbles)
(extends a hand to support) Be careful.
(a shadow suddenly appears before his eyes) Ah! Was that just an illusion? Thanks for your help, miss...
(successfully retrieves his father's item, wandering around Kaifeng) Ah, what's that up ahead...

profile.name: Little Beggar
profile.public profile: The little beggar harassed by bandits whom Link encounters in Kaifeng, appearing very filial and coming from a destitute family.
profile.private profile: In cahoots with the bandits, actually a swindler.
profile.goal: To survive, whether through begging or swindling.

dialog.content: What do you want to do? This is the money my mother gave me for treatment! Somebody help! Help!

content.content: I've seen this trick too many times; it's probably two thugs staging an act, just to deceive outsiders... I should just walk away.
Forget it, I'm not good at martial arts, better to look out for myself.
Such an outrageous situation! Even if I'm not skilled, I should still help this little beggar!
What? Such a thing is happening? Wait, I'm going to join in and grab that little beggar too!

question: #question#How can Link demonstrate his ability to control impulses and think rationally?

content.content: In broad daylight, under the watchful sky, how do you bandits dare not to cease at once?!
You can't bully the weak like this.
Little beggar, fight back against them, hit them now!
If you don't stop, I'll just have to kneel and beg you to stop!

question: #question#How can Link express his sense of justice in his anger?

dialog.content: Hey, kid, why are you staring over here? Are you looking for a fight?
(Collides) Hero, please save me! I still need to buy medicine for my mother!
Hmph, little con artist, I've already seen through your tricks! Save you? I'd be thankful if you don’t swindle me out of everything I have!
(Carried off by the bandit) Help, help…

(Snickers) Quite the performance, huh? (Patting his pocket, discovering his lotus jade pendant is gone) Oh no! My pendant! It must have been stolen when that little con bumped into me! Damn it, they're all gone now, and I can't get it back!

Before he could even venture into the martial world, Link lost the jade pendant left by his biological parents, missing the chance to uncover the mystery of his origin, and failing to live freely and bravely as his parents had hoped… If he could start over, taking on acts of 'justice' with a bit of naive bravery, would things turn out better?
Tsk, busybody, let's get out of here!
Thank you, brave hero. I need to go buy medicine for my mother!

Hey, wait a minute... (pats himself down) Oh no, my jade pendant is missing. It must have happened the moment I bumped into... (chases after the little beggar) Hey! You little beggar! Give back my stuff!

No, no, no, don't hit my face. They forced me to deceive people. I've been without parents since I was a kid, wandering around Kaifeng with nothing but this wooden hairpin as a token looking for relatives. But life got too hard, and I had to do these things... here's your stuff back! Please spare me!
Glad I got it back. This lotus jade pendant has been with me since I was a child. Losing it would really make me uncomfortable.
This jade pendant...
What is it? Do you like jewelry like this?
It's nothing, it's getting late. Your father is still waiting for you, you should hurry back.
You're right, if I go back late, Dad will start nagging. If I don't hurry, it'll be dark soon.

(Muttering to himself on the mountain path home) This path is so hard to navigate, I can't see a thing. It would be nice to have some light. That old man, doesn’t even think to bring a lantern to meet me. Huh, there's a light ahead? Great, Dad— (walks closer and sees a large blaze)
What happened... Am I dreaming? Everyone in the village... why are you all lying here, it's so cold outside... how can this be, everyone...
Bastard! How could it be you! Why did you target this place!
Brother Yuwen...?
You foolish boy, watch out! (pats Link's lower back)

profile.name: Yuwen Ke
profile.public profile: One of the people young Link admires, whom Link calls 'Brother Yuwen'. He is skilled in martial arts and has a sense of justice. In the tragic event at Crescent Village, he implanted Link with the 'Heartless Technique', misunderstood by Link as a villain.
profile.private profile: Opposed to the Jiangnan Dao, willing to sacrifice himself to kill Jiangnan Dao.
profile.goal: On one hand, help Link understand his own heritage, on the other, eradicate the White Robe Sect and uphold martial righteousness.

dialog.content: This is the True Qi of Heavenly Reputation. In four years, you will become a cripple. Go seek the truth, there's time...
Son, listen well. You are my adopted child. That black lotus jade pendant is from your birth parents... your biological parents were known as the 'Evil Sword Couple'.
Enough! That stuff doesn't matter... blood... why won't your bleeding stop!
Come closer, let me look at you one more time, son… (takes his last breath)

(Wakes up from a dream) Ah! That dream again. That's right, I joined the sect and swore to avenge my father. The tragedy at Crescent Village and the loss of my biological parents are still shrouded in mystery. My birth parents, the Evil Sword Couple, everyone says they didn't believe in Buddhism or any sect and looked down on reputable families, but they were chased by the righteous sects because they wanted to seize the Yuwen Manor's treasure, the White Lotus Jade Pendant. But my parents, were they really such people? I recently reunited with Jiang Linglu, and I didn't expect her to be an old acquaintance of Yuwen Ke. Jiang Linglu's father is seriously ill and finding Yuwen Ke is a must to cure him. At the same time, to avenge the people of Crescent Village and to uncover the truth, I must find Yuwen Ke to settle all this...

content.content: To achieve my goals, I must gain great power!
To achieve my goals, I must first gather clues!

dialog.content: I've heard that recently the White-Clad Sect has been causing havoc everywhere, attacking disciples of righteous sects. There's even a rumor that they are capturing children in Kaifeng and sending them to the capital, involving many innocent people who are forced to flee. If I can successfully defeat them, my martial arts will surely improve!
You're all safe now, let me take you home.
Alright, once everything's settled, I should get going...
So you are the one obstructing our actions?
(Becomes alert) Who are you?

Haven't you been tracking us down? I think highly of you. If you're willing to join the White-Clad Sect, I'll certainly welcome you. If you still wish to grow stronger, then give up on what you call the righteous sects.

content.content: The White-Clad Sect is stirring up chaos in the martial world. How many innocents would be displaced or affected? I will not join the White-Clad Sect.
Even though I want to become stronger, I don't trust what a notorious person like you says. I will not join the White-Clad Sect.
If I join the White-Clad Sect, Hero Yan would be the first to come and kill me. I will not join the White-Clad Sect.
Joining the White-Clad Sect is going against the righteous path of the world, facing the scorn of people everywhere. I cannot join the White-Clad Sect.

question: #question#How should Link respond to demonstrate his moral integrity?

content.content: (If I refuse now, I might die right here... might as well agree for now and find a way to escape later...) To become stronger, to avenge sooner, I will join the White-Clad Sect!
(Persuaded by Jiang NanDao, gradually becoming excited) Alright! I’ll join the White-Clad Sect, I want to stand atop the martial world!
If I don't join, you'll probably kill me right now, so I'll join the White-Clad Sect.
With your help, I can definitely avenge the villagers! I want to join the White-Clad Sect!

question: #question#How should Link respond to demonstrate his ability to regulate stress and fear in this high-pressure situation, making a proper decision?

dialog.content: This world needs change, and necessary sacrifices are inevitable. We must destroy those so-called righteous sects and tear off their hypocritical masks.

Those righteous sects you talk about have maintained the order in the world. You’re nothing but a selfish scoundrel, harming so many innocent people and calling it a 'necessary sacrifice'? All you want is boundless power for yourself.
I was mistaken. I thought you were much like your parents, but it turns out you’ve been deceived by those righteous sects, truly an utter fool. Let me end your life here!

content.content: Avoiding the edge is the best strategy; time to make a tactical retreat!
Face off directly, I must demonstrate my integrity!

dialog.content: Trying to go up against the leader of White Robe Sect at this moment is just a pipe dream! I'd better make a run for it. (Looks back to see Jiangnan Dao doesn't seem to be coming after him)

profile.name: Wen Yin
profile.public profile: Female assassin, once taken care of by Link for a time, later roamed the martial world with Link

dialog.content: Since then, as if to prove Jiangnan Dao's actions were wrong, I began to wander the martial world, punishing evil and promoting good. During this time, I met Wen Yin, who was being pursued. She was an assassin, hunted by her enemies. After that, Wen Yin received another task, requiring her to infiltrate the palace to assassinate a certain important person.
I must complete my mission. I am very grateful for all you've done for me, but all good things must come to an end, so let's part ways here.

content.content: I can't just leave you on your own. Let me go with you, this way we can look out for each other. I don't want to see you hurt again.
If you go alone and die halfway, wouldn't you fail your mission? Let me go with you.
If you really appreciate what I've done, join me in finding clues instead, give up on your assignment, it's too dangerous.
I want to go with you, if we finish the mission together I might even get some benefit, which would help my revenge.

question: #question# What can Link say to persuade Wen Yin to accept his company?

content.content: All good things must come to an end, let's part ways here. I wish you success with your mission and hope we meet again!
Alright, since we're going in different directions, let's part sooner rather than later!
Alright, traveling together might just burden each other, let's part ways sooner then.
All good things must come to an end. Although the time with you was happy, it used up too much of my time for revenge. To get my revenge sooner, let's separate.

question: #question# How can Link ease the sadness of parting and make Wen Yin feel comfortable?

dialog.content: (Somewhat touched, showing a smile) Thank you.

After that, Link ventured through the martial world with Wen Yin, witnessing the changing times. They enjoyed the beauty of nature and the joys of life, living freely and happily. Roaming through the rivers and lakes, inviting friends to gather, reveling in the pleasures of the mortal world. Yet, the more they witnessed the hardships of life, the more they realized their own helplessness and insignificance. The conspiracy of the White-Robed Sect remained undisclosed, and the truth about his biological parents was still shrouded in darkness. If there is a next life, it would be good to uncover the truth of all this…
(Hesitates to speak, eyes showing reluctance) Until fate brings us together again...

After that, Link roamed the martial world alone, witnessing the changes of the world. The more suffering he saw, the more he realized his own helplessness and insignificance. He returned to Crescent Village to rebuild his home on the abandoned wasteland. He no longer concerned himself with the disputes of the martial world, focusing only on protecting his most cherished piece of land. Peaceful and content, with no desire to compete with the world. It was a pity that the conspiracy of the White Clothing Cult had yet to be unveiled, and the truth about his biological parents still remained shrouded in darkness. If there is a next life, it would be great to uncover the truth of it all...
(gripping Link's throat) I'm really sorry...

Jiangnan Dao's power is overwhelming, standing before him feels like an ant gazing up at a towering tree. Despair chokes him, and before he realizes it, Link's clothes are soaked in blood. His life ends so abruptly like this. Reluctance, fear, anger, sadness... all these emotions surge in his heart. If he could do it all over again, Link would change everything, uncover all the truths.

You won't regret your choice. There's no clear line between the righteous path and the evil one. The world needs reform, and necessary sacrifices must be made. One day, you'll understand what true freedom is.
I'm willing to join...
What are you doing?!
The troublemaker has arrived, let’s end it here today. You’re a lot like your parents...
Wait, you know my parents?!
We’ll meet again. (Before Yan Feipeng could arrive, his figure had already vanished.)

After that, Link realized the power gap between him and the White Robe Sect and practiced even harder. One day, a surge of true energy coursed through his body. After that, his condition continued to deteriorate. Finally, as if a valve had been opened, everything subsided into silence. Stricken with uncontrollable true energy, Link had to give up his life in the martial world and live in a secluded village. One day, he had a dream. It was the dream of the day he went to Kaifeng to run errands for Old Tian Liu. In the dream, he was still the naive, hot-blooded youth.
This mountain path is really hard to walk, can't see a thing. If only there was some light. Hey, the light up ahead, could it be—
(holding a lantern) You finally made it back, kid. Don't tell me you stopped halfway to listen to stories again?
Dad? What are you doing here?
What are you talking about, kiddo? Did you hit your head somewhere? The food's almost cold, there's braised fish today, your favorite. Come on, let's head home...
If I could do it all over again, I must uncover the truth behind all this.
To investigate Yu Wenke's whereabouts, Jiang Linglu and I have embarked on another journey.
No suspicious individuals are allowed through! Unless... you pay a toll and prove your innocence.
I have no interest in wasting words on someone as rotten as you. Step aside, and I might just spare your life.
Haha, as expected of a righteous hero, what arrogance!

(Seeing the bandit refuse to yield, he starts to fight. The bandit is merely a minor thug, fierce but lacking skill, quickly falling at a disadvantage.) Just give up and live an honest life. Stop going down this crooked path.

Hahahahaha—Young hero, you righteous types say the funniest things! You're cruel yet hypocritical, acting like great saints! Aren’t you afraid that by sparing me today, I'll gather my brothers and come back stronger? Your hometown, your loved ones, everything you hold dear will be crushed into dust!
(Recalling the tragedy of Crescent Village, anger rises in him.) You!

content.content: Scum like you shouldn’t even exist in this world! You're no better than the evil you were born into! I won't give you another chance to continue your wickedness!
My hometown and family are already gone; you won't have the chance to trample them again.
I may be from a righteous faction, but I'm not cruel. You will not harm what I hold dear.
You mean to come back stronger? Then maybe I should just kill you now, so you can't plague my hometown again.

question: #question#How should Link respond to show his hatred and anger towards the bandit in this situation?

content.content: No one is born evil; you still have a chance to make things right. You were probably deceived by the White-Clad Sect masqueraders, pretending to be righteous. Turn back now, and you can still lead a stable life...
I'm not pretending to be a saint, but you certainly turned into quite the villain. You didn’t always want to live like this, did you?
Maybe you have no home or family, but are you willing to let your bandit brothers live a life of violence and struggle like you?
I've lost my hometown and family, yet I didn’t become a bandit like you! As long as you're willing, you too can live a righteous life.

question: #question#How can Link demonstrate empathy and perspective-taking skills towards the bandit?

dialog.content: Haha, born evil, huh? That's not too bad. I'll slaughter your family, set fires—

(Swings his blade, watching the bandit's head fall with the flash of the sword, suddenly noticing something drop from the bandit's pocket) Huh, what's this? (Picks it up and finds it's a small parcel carefully wrapped in ragged cloth, clearly treated with care by its owner. Inside is a crudely crafted wooden hairpin) Is this something he stole? It doesn't look like it. This thing won't fetch a price, yet he kept it so dear. Maybe this object, or its owner, meant a lot to him. Even someone like this might have family... Facing this corpse, I can't feel any satisfaction. I haven't done wrong, this man surely harmed many innocent people before. But is just killing him enough? Will that change everything and save those mired in suffering?

The more I investigate, the more tangled things become. These days, there's more and more unrest in the martial world. The White-Clothed Sect is causing havoc everywhere, attacking disciples of righteous sects. There's even a rumor they're capturing children in Kaifeng to send to the capital. Could there be some connection between the White-Clothed Sect and Yuwen Ke?
You're safe now, let me take you home.
Alright, once all is settled, I should leave as well…
You shouldn't stay here; the White-Clothed Sect has its eyes on you.
(Shocked by the familiar voice) !! Yuwen Ke!

No need to be alarmed, I don't intend to be your enemy. It wasn't me who caused the massacre at Crescent Village, it was Shen Bing of the White-Clothed Sect. Jiang Linglu beside you, she's the daughter of the sect leader.
(Avoiding Link's gaze) At first, I just wanted to cure my father's illness, I didn't know he was involved with the White-Clothed Sect…

That night, I went to ask my father about my origins but was preempted by Shen Bing. By the time I reached the village, it was… Shen Bing's attack used a technique that caused your internal injuries, which I suppressed with the Heart Method of No Repute. My heart was filled with hatred, I didn't want to face you, I didn't know how to tell you the truth. This white jade pendant, the one in your hand, they are a pair. It's said that having these two pendants reveals the origins of martial arts. Years ago, your parents set fire to Yuwen Manor to get this pendant. Eventually, they were surrounded by righteous forces and fell off a cliff to their deaths. To uncover the truth, I joined the White-Clothed Sect and found this pendant there...
So, the white jade pendant was indeed in your hands. Put down your sword, I won't harm you! On the contrary, I hope you can join the White-Clothed Sect.

My parents, though reckless, never did anything unconscionably heinous. They had their limits, they wouldn't harm ordinary people easily. Your White-Clothed Sect is causing chaos in the martial world, how many common people will suffer, be displaced?
You truly are the son of the Evil Sword Couple, you speak just like them. But you're too naive.
You've long put yourself at odds with the martial world. And I, I will execute justice on behalf of the heavens, and crush the White-Clothed Sect's schemes!
This world is moving further and further from our ideal home. Humanity isn't as black and white as you think, let go of your so-called justice! There's no revolution without bloodshed.
No need for more words, with our strength, we can surely take down this fiend!

Which revolution in history hasn't been accompanied by sacrifice? Remember, there's no such thing as absolute good or evil. To overturn even a small boat creates a splash. What I want to overthrow is that lofty tower, that high temple, those right paths that have rotted from the inside out! One day, you'll realize it. Those you helped, those you believed in...
You can't overturn anything anymore! (Attacks Jiang Nan Dao with all his might)

(Watching as Jiang Nan Dao finally loses the strength to support himself and falls backward, without stopping him) I always knew this day would come. This false sense of kinship, I won't let it bind me anymore… (Turns her back, tears streaming down her face)
Such a fertile medicinal field, perfect for breeding poisons, we might as well use it!
This is the life's work of a herbalist, aren't you afraid of divine retribution, taking advantage like this?

Why do you care so much? The herbalist has long fled, we're just making use of what's left... I see, you want a cut too, right? I get it, I get it, take this, is it enough? Can you stop pestering now?

This is how righteous people act. The White-Clothed Sect's plot was completely crushed, Jiang Linglu took over the sect, cleaning up their mess. After this, killing the culprit behind Crescent Village's destruction seemed like a full revenge. But was that really enough? Link had indeed vanquished the White-Clothed Sect, yet there was still a shadow in his heart, unsettled.

Haha, born to be evil? Well, that wouldn’t be so bad. Unfortunately, how often do things work out that perfectly? If it weren’t for those so-called righteous people taking over our lands, establishing their sects, separating me from my family, leaving me all alone, who would willingly leave their homeland to gamble their life for a living? Go ahead and kill me, but I have to ask you, are you truly absolutely righteous? Like those brightly painted shadow puppets, controlled without even knowing it...
(Affected by this profound question, starts to ponder) Wait a minute! (Seeing the bandit take advantage of the pause to escape into the ruins, then follows him inside)
I didn't expect there to be a whole other world in here.
We meet again, I didn't think you'd come to me yourself. Put down your sword. We actually share the same goal, and I won't strike you down.
The same... goal?

Aren't you even a little curious about the Evil Sword Couple? I knew them when I was just in my teens. Back then, the Five Mountains Sword Sect stole my achievements, and I was resented by the people I saved. During my escape, I met your parents. They were greatly kind to me. (Starts reminiscing)
Luckily, there was this cave to hide in... That group should have left, right?
Indeed, I've been waiting here for a while.
Who would have thought that the person who single-handedly wiped out the Yan Nan Fourteen Council and saved the people is just a snot-nosed kid.
Who are you people?
Alright, stop teasing him. Jiangnan Dao, we know you personally saved three thousand innocent people, but later, the Five Mountains Sword Sect robbed you of your credit.
(Through gritted teeth) Even those I saved turned against me, seeing me as the villain.
You're so young, why go against them? You have nowhere else to go, why not join our Tianyin Sect? It would provide some protection.

The Moon Worship Cult... You must have heard of that fateful night at Yuwen Village over twenty years ago. At that time, the Evil Sword Couple were chased by the so-called 'Martial Arts Nobles' to the depths of the snowy mountains and forced to hand over their jade pendant by those righteous sects. To protect you, who was still in swaddling clothes, they chose to end their own lives.
My parents, sacrificed for me...

They foresaw everything long ago, entrusting the white jade pendant to me ahead of time. Back then, I lacked the courage and ability to stop it. But I swore an oath to them, to the entire martial world... those hypocrites who caused your parents' demise—you should have seen them already. From the start, the White Robe Sect existed for this very reason. Such a vast sect shouldn't be led by me. Today, the true leader finally stands before me. You are my guest, you have the right to choose, think it over well!

content.content: If I join the White Robe Sect, it would go against my parents' original intentions. I'm sorry, I have to decline your invitation.
You're just spewing nonsense, old man! You're completely deceiving me, I won't join the White Robe Sect!
If I join the White Robe Sect, I would be shunned by the world, I can't join the White Robe Sect.
Even though joining the White Robe Sect could avenge my parents, it would mean going against the righteous path, I'm scared, I better not join the White Robe Sect...

question: #question# How can Link respond to express his true intentions?

content.content: I want to join the White Robe Sect and rebuild the entire martial arts order and justice!
I agree with your proposal, I want to experience what it's like to be at the top too!
Alright, then I'll join the White Robe Sect, otherwise, I'm afraid you'll come after me.
Alright, with the help of the White Robe Sect, I can definitely avenge my parents! Kneel and call me master!

question: #question# How should Link respond to showcase his sense of responsibility and justice?

dialog.content: My parents may have been reckless, but they never committed any heinous crimes. They had their principles and wouldn't take advantage of ordinary people. Your Baiyi Cult has thrown the martial world into chaos; how many common folk will be caught in the crossfire and left homeless?
You really are the son of the Evil Sword Couple; you speak just like them. But you're incredibly naive.
You've long placed yourself against the martial world. And I am going to act on behalf of justice to crush the Baiyi Cult's schemes!
This world is drifting further from our ideal homeland. Humanity isn't as black and white as you think. Abandon your so-called justice! There's no revolution without bloodshed.
No more words needed; I will bring down you, this monster, once and for all!

Tell me which revolution in history wasn't accompanied by sacrifices. Remember, there's no such thing as absolute good or evil. Trying to upset a canoe will naturally cause splashes. What I'm aiming to overthrow is that lavish tower, those grand temples, the very orthodoxy that has rotted from inside out! One day, you'll understand. What you assisted, what you believed in...
You won't overthrow anything anymore! (Rushes at Jiang Nandao with all his might)

With Jiang Nandao dead, the Baiyi Cult will cease to exist, yet he managed to plant a seed of doubt in my heart. If the so-called righteous path is driven by selfish motives that caused the death of my own parents, is it really a path I should pursue?
Such fertile medicinal fields, perfect for breeding gu. Might as well use them if they're just lying there!
This is a lifetime's savings for the herbalists. Aren't you afraid of divine retribution for taking advantage of their misfortune?

Why do you care so much? The herbalists have long since fled. We're just repurposing... I get it, you want a piece of the action too, don't you? I understand, I understand. Here, is this enough? Can you stop pestering us now?

So this is how the righteous path operates. The Baiyi Cult's conspiracy was utterly crushed, and Jiang Linglu took over, cleaning up the mess they left behind. After this, all that remains is to kill the culprit who destroyed Crescent Village to finally avenge them. But even with the Baiyi Cult annihilated, Link feels a shadow still lingering in his heart.

My biological parents were driven to their deaths by those so-called righteous sects, and the father who raised me was killed by a subordinate of the White Robe Sect. Since I’ve decided to vie for dominance in the martial world, I might as well choose this side. This world is moving further from being an ideal place, and it needs change! My biological parents once told me they hoped I would attain true freedom in the martial world. I won’t be deceived by those so-called righteous paths in my efforts to change this world.

The White Robe Sect can offer some benefits too, hahahaha. The people of this city have fled as refugees, and these fertile medicinal fields are just perfect for cultivating Gu. Might as well use it rather than waste it!
This is the life savings of the medicinal farmers! Aren’t you afraid of divine retribution for taking advantage of them in their peril?

Why do you care so much? The farmers have already fled for refuge, and we're merely recycling... I get it, you also want a piece of the pie, right? I understand, I understand. Here, is this enough? Can you stop pestering us now?

content.content: Since you won’t listen to reason, prepare to die!
Alright, I'll take this money.

dialog.content: (collapses in disbelief) You, you must be crazy… Kill me… and you’ll be declaring war on the Five Mountains Sword Sect…
You've got the money, you can leave...
(swings the knife) Leave? You're dreaming! Do you think I'll let you keep causing trouble? I want more than just the money in your hands; I want your filthy heart, your wretched life!

Though he cut ties with the seemingly virtuous sect, Link himself seemed to have become a ruthless villain without principles or limits. 'Not to be deceived by the righteous path' — is this truly the way?

You’re getting clever, kid, even learning to haggle… But even though you make some sense, I'd rather make the trip myself. First, it gives me peace of mind, and second, it saves some money… Kid, if you’re trying to swindle your old man, you’re still too green!
Hey! Dad, you… Alright, alright, just take care on the road.

Link missed the chance to go to Kaifeng. On a night a few days later, a huge fire devastated Crescent Moon Village, claiming the lives of all its inhabitants, including Link… If only he could go back and hadn’t tried to outsmart his dad, would things have turned out differently?
